thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com
thread.title: Matthew W Orsi
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Matthew W Orsi

author: Matthew W Orsi
title: Matthew W Orsi
text: FramesDirect had a discontinued frame/sunglasseses on their website that was a little frustrating to find out after the order had been submitted. But the customer service rep who reached out about the scenario was very nice and pleasant to work with to get the order corrected with a differing pair of glasses that I now love.
